mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_CHAT_ROOM.CURRVAL, #{memberNum}, (SELECT DIV_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN DIVISION ON DIVISION = DIV_CODE WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}), (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}), (SELECT RANK_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN RANK ON RANK = RANK_CODE WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}), NULL, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = (SELECT MAX(CHAT_ROOM_NO) FROM CHAT_ROOM)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_CONTENT VALUES(SEQ_CHAT_CONTENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_CHAT_ROOM.CURRVAL, #{chatContent}, #{memNum}, DEFAULT, #{chatType})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CHAT_ROOM_NO, CHAT_ROOM_TITLE, CHAT_ROOM_TYPE FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO IN(SELECT DISTINCT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum}) ORDER BY CHAT_ROOM_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM CHAT_CONTENT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY CHAT_CONTENT_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
